name: La Quinta Inn Hartford Bradley Airport

reviews.title: Best deal near BDL
reviews.text: I visit Connecticut frequently from Texas to see my daughter. Early on, around 3 years ago, I sampled some of the other hotels in Windsor Locks and it was terrible (except for one very expensive one in Avon.) For a mid-priced hotel, LQ cannot be beat and the shuttle is reliable and the staff very friendly. Some of the staff have virtually watched my daughter grow up from an infant barely over 1 year old to an almost 5 year old now! She thinks of LQ in Windsor Locks as "Daddy's big house". It is like having a 2nd home in Connecticut for us.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a good cheap place to stay near the airport. We flew in after midnight and called the hotel to send a shuttle out. They use LazFly shuttles so there were people from a few different hotels on our bus. We were the first stop, nice and close!
reviews.title: Close to Airport w/ free shuttle
Helpful airport service
reviews.text: The rooms were decent for the price with an older microwave and fridge. The room was clean and quiet. I would stay here again for a quick overnight airport trip.

The free breakfast had a good selection. I used the "make your own waffles" bar. No toppings except for syrup but it was free. There were also bagels, muffins, hard boiled eggs, coffee, OJ, Apple Juice, etc available.
reviews.title: Clean friendly close to airport
clean, comfortable, great value
reviews.text: This hotel was on the very nice side of basic. No frills, but very clean, spacious enough, and the bed was fresh. The best part was that they let you leave your car in their lot for less $$ than the airport lot, and there's a complimentary shuttle to the airport and back. Very convenient.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not anticipate the need for a hotel at Bradley Intl. Airport, but our flight was canceled at the last minute and the airline booked us into the LaQuinta. We arrived at about 10:30 p.m.with the intention of getting the 4:30 a.m. shuttle for an early flight home. The desk clerk was quite friendly and greeted us warmly. The check-in process was very efficient and there were no problems with the hotel voucher that was provided by our airline.
reviews.title: Good Fallback Plan
Good airport hotel
reviews.text: The LaQuinta is certainly an economy hotel and didn't offer much in the way of amenities, but all we really needed was a place to stay for the night. In the morning, check-out was also quite easy and once we turned in they key, we were on our way to the airport terminal. I prefer a few more touches of luxury in a hotel, but the LaQuinta is a good fallback plan if one is stuck at the Hartford-Springfield Airport. All in all, it wasn't a bad hotel experience.

Had an early morning connection and La Quinta was very close to the airport with shuttle service that was very convenient and quick. I had made an error in our reservation but the staff quickly corrected that error and were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable, and a nice breakfast to star the day!
Very Disappointing
reviews.text: We drove in from the Philly area on Sunday, and arrived about 9. We had called ahead and spoken to the desk clerk, and when we arrived, he acknowledged that call, and welcomed us. He was pleasant and friendly, although not polished or especially professional.
We didn't have any issues, other than a minor one with the waffle maker- but the waffles tasted good, they just didn't come out pretty.
reviews.title: Airport stay
Best hotel/motel experience I've ever had
reviews.text: I can't think of 1 negative thing to say about my stay. The physical facility was in great shape, the staff was friendly and helpful and the location was excellent. Having a "free" breakfast and laundry facilities onsite also helped keep costs down. I'm not a frequent traveler and this was my first stay at a La Quinta but it'll be my first choice in any of my future trips.

Stayed one night and was very pleased with this hotel. Stayed in an executive king and had ample room. Very clean and comfortable. Close to airport and highway. The sink was separate from rest of bathroom and had plenty of counter space with a large mirror. Have no problem recommending this hotel.
reviews.title: Clean and large room....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While the exterior of the hotel is rather ugly, it's what's inside that counts! We got a great rate on the room and did not experience any problems. The bed & pillows were a bit stiff (normal) and the room appointments were a bit old. However, everything looked well cared for and there was nothing specific that looked too dated or out of place. In the end, this is a value chain and we got a great value!
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: I needed a room that would take pets after I tired driving. The room had a very fair price, was nice and clean and had a comfortable bed with good pillows. The staff was friendly, and I appreciated that they put us at the end of the hall where my dog was happier since it was quiet. The Internet was not the greatest, but the signal was weaker because we were at the end of the hall. There was a nice flat screen TV in the room. Good value for travel with a pet.
reviews.title: La Quinta Inn Hartford Bradley Airport, CT

reviews.text: Are recent stay at laquinta hotel was very nice. When we arrived guy at front counter was very nice and quick check in. Room was nice and bed was very comfortable. I also used the gym membership that hotel had at Golds gym which was easy and great idea. Breakfast was good lady was very busy but all food was stocked and very clean. Check out was a snap and very well priced. We are from New York an went to six flags and hotel is close. I also always review on trip advisor and will put a great review for hotel.
reviews.title: Close to six flags new England. Nice hotel
Everything a pet friendly hotel offers
reviews.text: clean and comfortable, sevice was very good, front desk, friendly, breakfast what you expect from a LQ.... dog friendly
Truly friendly, all amenities, no nasty smells , comfy room. Great customer service!
reviews.title: A decent place close to BDL International

aka: La Quinta Inn Hartford Bradley Airport Hotel
